extensionDescription.message: A Firefox authenticator that can autofill TOTP codes with Firefox Android support

confirm.description: Confirm button text before account deleted

none.description: Displayed when no Container is assigned

submit.description: Submit form content as a new account

reset.description: Reset form to its initial status

export.description: Export all data to your disk

label_assign_container.description: Current Container which the account assigned onto

label_issuer.description: The site from which generates OTP secret key

label_algorithm.description: Hash algorithm used to manipulate Secret Tokens

label_algorithm_time.description: OTP type that based on time

label_algorithm_counter.description: OTP type that based on counter

about_acknowledgement_thanks_to_helpers.message: Many ðŸ’– to helpers during project building:

about_acknowledgement_helper_first.message: Mozilla for Photon Design & icon assets .

about_acknowledgement_helper_second.message: QRScaner for QR code manipulation & JSOTP for TOTP code generation.

about_acknowledgement_helper_third.message: Authenticator & Yubioath Desktop for features inspiration.

about_acknowledgement_helper_fourth.message: Firefox Send for encryption code & js-base64 for base64 encoding.

about_acknowledgement_helper_fifth.message: Violentmonkey for Dropbox sync API manipulation.

about_respected_RFC.message: TOTP codes manipulation methods in this project respect RFC 6238 .

about_license.message: Except where otherwise noticed, this project is licensed under GNU General Public License 3.0 .

general_checkout_wiki.message: Check out our wiki to get started.

general_option_autofill.message: Disable TOTP code autofill globally (so that codes must be filled manually via context menu or popup).

tokens_warning_message_content.message: Deleting account info doesn't disable 2FA. Make sure you won't be locked out before proceed.
